name: Trivox
description:
Paint the underwater worlds in this minimalist puzzle game.

How to Install

1. Download archive and unzip it

3. Find Trivox.exe file

4. Have fun!

How to Play

Click on the triangles to rotate them. The goal of each level is to collect triangles of a certain color.

This early version contains 22 levels and features 4 different mechanics.

Seafloor Lab team

TiRex - Coding, soundtrack

RustyHarper - Art, game-design
